title: Area SE Indiana high school football schedule for Oct. 16
text:
Area SE Indiana high school football schedule for Oct. 16 
Updated: Fri, Oct 16 2015, 09:03 AM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- Here is a look at the high school football schedule involving area Indiana teams for Oct. 16 (note all times 7 p.m. unless noted and games are in alphabetical order by home team) and for updated scores throughout the weekend go here on a desktop and scroll down to the ScoreStream scoreboard: 
FRIDAY'S GAMES 
Indianapolis Broad Ripple at Franklin County Rushville at Greensburg Oldenburg Academy at Indianapolis Washington East Central at Indianapolis Roncalli, 7:30 p.m.South Dearborn at Lawrenceburg 
Follow us on Twitter @Local12 and LIKE us on Facebook for updates! 
To get "The Skinny" on local sports be sure to follow Local12 Digital Sports Columnist/Editor Richard Skinner on Twitter @Local12Skinny and LIKE him on Facebook for updates or email him raskinner@sbgtv.com. Related Stories 
LAMAR ODOM - TRACING HIS STEPS 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- He's been in a hospital since Tuesday, as doctors try to save his life. Business News 
Greece's Tsipras faces first test since bailout rebellion 
ATHENS, Greece (AP) -- Left-wing Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras (TSEE'-prahs) on Friday faces his first test in parliament since a bailout rebellion split his party and triggered a snap general election last month. Science/Tech News 
IN THE NEWS: DAILY FANTASY SPORTS SHUT DOWN BY NEVADA REGULATORS 
LAS VEGAS (AP) -- Nevada officials are ordering daily fantasy sports sites like DraftKings and FanDuel to shut down -- saying the sites can't operate without a gambling license. Stay Connected:
